Articles.Content: Okay, I was on the plane, and I turned my computer off to land, and I get home, boot up, and KSP's LF/ox tanks suddenly don't have any fuel!? I will add more info later.

do have a fuel switch mod active, ( I run 3 different ones )?

In the past when I have modded a tank with a fuel switch, then removed that mod the tanks contain nothing. 

Geh
